src_original: [Paṃca dosāḥ]  katame pañca doṣā ity āha /  kausīdyam avavādasya saṃmoṣo laya uddhataḥ /
asaṃskāro 'tha saṃskāraḥ pañca doṣā ime matāḥ // IV.4
āśrayāṅgaṃ svabhāvāṅgaṃ niryāṇāṅgaṃ tṛtīyakaṃ /  caturtham anuśaṃsāṅgan niḥkleśāṅgaṃ tridhā mataṃ // IV.8
darśanamārge bodhāv aṅgāni bodhyaṅgāni /  tatra bodher āśrayāṅgaṃ smṛtiḥ /
